Title: Directs the commissioner of transportation to conduct a statewide study and review of the transportation of individuals with developmental disabilities
Summary: Directs the commissioner of transportation, in consultation with the commissioner of the office for people with developmental disabilities, to conduct a statewide study and review of the transportation of individuals with developmental disabilities.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the commissioner of transportation to conduct a statewide study and review of the transportation of individuals with developmental disabilities
